title: Mystery Champions being distributed, What'd you get?
body:
Share your loot here ;)

http://puu.sh/mSGCE/31511bb88f.jpg

> Mystery Champions will be distributed over the coming days, although Ocean Week icons have been distributed!

replies.body: Rengar :)
Where is the "unlike" button?
Oh god. That champion's dirty, and you know it!
D: I have a whole heap of champions I don't own :( I'm a mid/top player so I wont play him too much, I promise <3

LeBlanc

http://i.imgur.com/uU7jpzL.png?1
You don't own all the champions already? :o
No, I play some ARAM from time to time so I rather have only champ I play :)
Zyra :D
Oh, damn! A 6300IP champion. Congrats mang!

Hey dudes,

This is a slow process - it is given out in batches over the next few days.

It should be finished by the end of the week. If you haven't received yours yet don't worry, we will post a 'Mystery Champion distribution is complete!' in a few days when the run ends.

For example I haven't received mine yet either!

Thanks for the official word. I figured that was probably the case, but I always like to make sure. Perhaps there should be an official post on the launcher or mainpage to prevent these kind of questions in the first place?

Just went up! 

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/LryNggNH-ocean-week-mystery-champion-update
Awesome, thanks for that.
Sephyre!!! I got sweeper Alistar, I no longer need to use Unchained Ali! :D I hope you have yours now{{champion:12}}

> [{quoted}](name=Sephyre,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OAElR3eF,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-02T05:28:19.810+0000)
>
> Hey dudes,
> 
> This is a slow process - it is given out in batches over the next few days.
> 
> It should be finished by the end of the week. If you haven't received yours yet don't worry, we will post a 'Mystery Champion distribution is complete!' in a few days when the run ends.
> 
> For example I haven't received mine yet either!

are the skins for people with all champs coming later then?
Very likely, yes.
{{champion:111}}
[i am now a tristana main](http://i.imgur.com/I8wKeSQ.jpg)
I own all the champions so I got a skin instead - that skin being... Eternum Nocturne (legendary!) {{champion:56}}

Sion
{{champion:14}}
Eww I got {{champion:5}}. Luckily I already destroyed my female/yordle champion pool by buying nasus so i can swap with my duo partner, so I am only feeling slightly disgusted.
Caitlyn unfortunately.
I got Sejuani {{champion:113}}
Are you going to play her? I'm a fan of her engage and gank potential, but the clear's a bit slow. :p

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OAElR3eF,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2016-02-02T16:28:54.002+0000)
>
> Are you going to play her? I'm a fan of her engage and gank potential, but the clear's a bit slow. :p

I reckon I will, yeah. Haven't yet, but may as well make the most of having her!
Rek'Sai! =)

Yerp, that happened.
http://imgur.com/eIdGdSt
i Got Olaf {{champion:2}} (Probs never gonna use him{{item:3070}} ) and my little brother got Jhin! {{champion:202}}
Thresh. Time to go practice those hooks :p
Gotta practice dem MadLife hooks! Thresh is probably one of my favorite supports (and AD carries)

Nothing as the rollout is staggered over the next few days, it'll come.

Edit:  Just got "it"

Kog'Maw
i got kindred. im guaranteed to get a 6300 champion anyway because i bought every one thats cheaper

I got Skarner{{champion:72}} 

which I try before and dun like him, can we swap gift like Christmas?
Can't swap like Christmas :( Sorry!
So is this a staggered thing? I haven't received mine yet, and I got like 20 points throughout the event.
Got 24, still waiting. it'll come friend, don't worry

I didn't get anything yet :( 

_Please be a 6300 champion, Please be a 6300 champion, Please be a 6300 champion...._
hahahha same
haven't got mine yet :(

Haven't got mine yet and my friends asking me what I've gotten…. I've contributed like 67 points and they have their gifts and i don't :/ kk. but i don't mind on waiting just hope its a good skin and not like northern front swain that every seemed to get last time you did this.
i ended up getting Jurassic Cho'gath as a skin (owning all the champs is fun.)
